text: Daniel Edward Pilarczyk (August 12, 1934 â€“ March 22, 2020) was an American prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was Archbishop of Cincinnati, Ohio from 1982 to 2009. Pilarczyk was born in Dayton, Ohio. From 1989 to 1992, he was President of the U.S. Conference of Catholic Bishops. Pilarczyk died on March 22, 2020 in Cincinnati at the age of 85.Archbishop Emeritus Daniel Pilarczyk has passed away ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American Roman Catholic archbishops Category:People from Dayton, Ohio Category:People from Cincinnati
title: Daniel Edward Pilarczyk
